name: yew
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an evergreen tree (= one that never loses its leaves) with flat leaves like needles and small, red fruits : In the middle of the churchyard stands an old yew. Yew, box, or holly are suitable for hedges. a yew tree
sarahdoow/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
[ U ] wood from the yew tree: yew furniture a bowl made from yew
More examplesFewer examplesBritain's oldest tree is thought to be a 3,800-year-old yew at Ashbrittle church in Somerset.avenues of lime and yewYew trees are the source of the anti-cancer drug taxol.Yew berries are poisonous.a solid yew four-poster bed
